NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: I shall be returning to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> soon, my friends. If it is ready, I would love to help deliver this new shipment of ore along the way!
2 1
COLEUS: Your kindness is deeply appreciated, Yarrow! However, we won't be sending the ore we have just mined to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> just yet.
3 2
COLEUS: The ore has to be sent to the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site</color> to be processed first, before it is ready to be used.
4 3
YARROW: I see! In that case, I believe Root is preparing to return to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> soon. Should I inquire if he could assist in delivering the ore to the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site?</color>
5 4
COLEUS: That would be a great help! You have my deepest gratitude, Yarrow.
